level.heading: Regional cooperation.
level.text: This subchapter encourages the Council to work with its Maryland and Virginia counterparts to develop a regional information sharing system that allows one-stops and welfare agencies in the District and surrounding jurisdictions to access information regarding regional employment opportunities, job training providers, and support services.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 17-353 validated a previously made technical correction by substituting "Council" for "Board".

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-150
level.text: For Law 13-150, see notes following ยง 32-1601.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-353
level.text: For Law 17-353, see notes following ยง 32-101.
